meanings.definition: A unit of power equal to one trillion watts.
meanings.sent1: The country needed more terawatts to meet its energy demands.
meanings.sent2: The solar panels generated several terawatts of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The terawatts of energy flowing through the power lines seemed to dance in the air.
meanings.sent4: The terawatts of electricity surged through the grid like a mighty river.
meanings.sent5: The terawatts of power hummed with a vibrant energy that lit up the city.

meanings.definition: The amount of power produced by one trillion joules per second.
meanings.sent1: Scientists measured the terawatts of energy released during the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The power plant aimed to generate several terawatts of electricity.
meanings.sent3: The terawatts of power seemed to have a mind of their own, zipping around the lab.
meanings.sent4: The terawatts of energy pulsed through the system like a beating heart.
meanings.sent5: The terawatts of power illuminated the room with a dazzling glow.
